item.description:
This is the first weekend of Spring! Let's do a roughly 2 hr. easy looping hike (just mostly gently rolling trail) at Northwest Park in Windsor with optional big pancake breakfast before. We'll pass through field, forest, and nice evergreen forest with views of the reservoir about half way through.

Meet in front of the Nature Center (see map) at 10 AM and we'll hike from there and take various trails or portions of trails as conditions allow.

Children and leashed dogs are welcome.

Better yet, optionally come early as there is a pancake breakfast held at the park from 8 AM to 11 AM with real maple syrup made at the park! Gloria will be there at about 9 AM.

Annual Pancake Breakfast

Wake up and head to Northwest Park this morning for the annual Friends of Northwest Park Pancake Breakfast from 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM in the Warming Shed.  Bring an appetite for a full breakfast of pancakes and sausage smothered in 100% pure maple syrup made right at Windsor’s very own Northwest Park.  Refreshment choices include orange juice, coffee, tea and hot chocolate.  $5.00 for adults and $4.00 for children.  Please call 860-285-1886 to register.  There will also be a CHIPS (child identification program) sponsored by the Masons from Windsor’s Washington Lodge #70.  Bring your children from ages birth to 18 to the Nature Center from 9:00 AM to 12:00 PM.

 


General directions:
* From Interstate 91 heading north, take Exit 38. From Interstate 91 heading south, take Exit 38A.
* Turn right at the exit on to Poquonock Avenue (Route 75).
* Go about 1.5 miles and turn left on to Prospect Hill Rd.
* Turn right at the traffic circle on to Lang Road
* Continue up the road to the Nature Center parking lot.

Approximate location/directions (103 Lang Rd., Windsor, CT):
http://mapq.st/UZzZkU

Trail map:
http://www.northwestpark.org/pdf/New_NWP_Map.pdf

Northwest Park and programs:
http://www.northwestpark.org/

 

=== Legal Stuff ===
By clicking on "Yes" for this event you agree, warrant, and covenant as follows:

In consideration for accepting this entry, I, the registrant, intending to be legally bound, hereby, for myself, my heirs, my executors and administrators, do waive and release any and all rights for damages I may have against any parties or persons connected with the Hartford Area Hiking meetup group for and related to the above listed event. I attest and verify that I am physically fit to participate in any portion of this above listed event. I grant Hartford Area Hiking permission to use any photographs, film or videotapes of this event for any purpose.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the Warming Shed. See Gloria's picture on profile.

group.name: The Hartford Area Hiking™ Meetup Group

item.name: Spring Hike at Northwest Park in Windsor CT
